relation: Looking for Partner July 29- Aug 4 Oahu
pageTitle: Rock Climbing Palolo Valley Crag in Oahu
textBeforeTable: Post New Topic What's New | Go to Forum | From Hawaii    Latest Regional Forum Messages Browse More Classics in Hawaii [more]    The bottom half is pretty quick, using the deep cracks. Once you are on top of that section, you reach for an undercling with your right hand, and then move your body far left and crimp the vein-like grooves running down the wall. Climb the upper slab using little parallel vertical edges for both hands. Wide reaches. Move feet up and then reach for slopers at the top, then top out. ... Palolo Valley Crag Oahu : Hawaii : E3 5c PG13  22 VII+ 22 6c 5.11a Follow the Veins Featured Route For Palolo Valley Crag
textAfterTable: Comments on Palolo Valley Crag Add Comment Show which comments — All Comments (1) Just Beta and Conditions (1) Just Conversational and Off-Topic (0) By tec2day Jan 2, 2014 I would not recommend using the first method listed for finding the wall. This is private property guarded by dogs, and my partner was bit by one. I recommend the "Scenic" route, it starts behind a row of mail boxes. Follow @mtnproject © 2015 Mountain Project Inc.
